description: Verify the user can reset state app by clicking on "Reset App State" in the side menu and remove button convert to add to cart button

steps.name: Click on add to cart button for product: Sauce Labs Backpack
Click on add to cart button for product: Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket
Click on Rest App State Link
Verify remove button convert to Add to cart button after resetting app state
